channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: About
item.description: Written by: Zikun (Alex) Xu. This blog talks about specific information on how COVID-19 has affected our city - Toronto. I talk about demographics, age groups that are at risk, sources of infection etc. Displaying the data in a simple manner and explaining how the data shows the severity of this issue within this city.

item.title: Summary of COV-ID 19 cases in Toronto
item.description: Author Zikun (Alex) Xu Abstract In this blog we explore the demographics, geographic, and severity data information for all confirmed and probable cases reported to Toronto Public Health department. We find the general areas where the majority of cases are reported and can imply future trends of how the virus is going to affect Toronto, Ontario. This matters as for which areas to be extra cautious whenever travelling is needed and which age-groups are at the highest risk.
